meanings.definition: To enter a wrong key or character on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: She miskeyed the password and couldn't log in.
meanings.sent2: He often miskeyed numbers when typing quickly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat miskeyed the commands on the keyboard, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a miskeyed melody, creating dissonance in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The miskeyed code led to a cascade of errors throughout the system.

meanings.sent1: The miskeyed document had many typos.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the miskeyed name on the list.
meanings.sent3: The miskeyed address made the package end up in the wrong city.
meanings.sent4: His miskeyed response left everyone confused.
meanings.sent5: The miskeyed information caused a lot of confusion among the team.
